structure:Codelist.common:Name: Urban Status Classification
structure:Codelist.common:Description: Classification of urban status for statistical data, including special codes for data processing.

structure:Code.common:Name: Special Processing Code
structure:Code.common:Description: Special code used for data processing and layout purposes.

structure:Code.common:Name: All Areas
structure:Code.common:Description: Data covering all urban and rural areas combined.

structure:Code.common:Name: Urban Areas
structure:Code.common:Description: Data covering only urban areas (cities and towns).

structure:Code.common:Name: Semi-Urban Areas
structure:Code.common:Description: Data covering semi-urban areas (suburban and peri-urban zones).

structure:Code.common:Name: Rural Areas
structure:Code.common:Description: Data covering only rural areas (villages and countryside).
